amendment.description: To ensure transparency in acquisition programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1038 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1038 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Lankford to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5794) To ensure transparency in acquisition programs.
